alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 23 at 5:19PM CDT until October 23 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mitchell County in north central Kansas... Eastern Jewell County in north central Kansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 519 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tipton, or 15 miles southwest of Beloit, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Beloit, Mankato, Glen Elder, Jewell, Tipton, Formoso, Randall, Hunter, Webber, Scottsville, Victor, Lovewell State Park and Montrose. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
